drupalNodeEvent.title: China Through American Eyes: Wenxian Zhang Author Event

field_speakers.processed: Wenxiang Zhang (Rollins College), Dr. Xin Huang (University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee)

field_description.processed: On Thursday, June 17, 2021 at 6PM EDT, established professor and decorated author, Wenxian Zhang will discuss his book "China Through American Eyes" with guest interviewer Dr. Xin Huang from the University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee.
